original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today, according to the Central Bank.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs. 319.84 while the selling rate is Rs. 335.68.
The Rupee has been appreciating against the USD and other major currencies since earlier this month, but the Rupee depreciates against the USD since last Friday.
